con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="SerasaService" targetNamespace="http://cursosoa.org/SerasaService/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tn="http://cursosoa.org/SerasaService/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ser="http://serasa.com.br/SN/Serasa"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://serasa.com.br/Serasa"> <xsd:import namespace="http://serasa.com.br/SN/Serasa" schemaLocation="../Schemas/Serasa.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="Serasaequest"> <wsdl:part element="ser:ParametrosSerasa" name="ParametrosSerasa"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SerasaResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ser:ResultadoSerasa" name="ResultadoSerasa"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="SerasaService"> <wsdl:operation name="ConsultarSerasa"> <wsdl:input message="tn:Serasaequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tn:SerasaResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="SerasaServiceSOAP" type="tn:SerasaService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="ConsultarSerasa"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://cursosoa.org/SerasaService/SerasaService"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="SerasaService"> <wsdl:port binding="tn:SerasaServiceSOAP" name="SerasaServiceSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://cursosoa.org/"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema targetNamespace="http://serasa.com.br/SN/Serasa" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://serasa.com.br/SN/Serasa"> <element name="ParametrosSerasa" type="tns:ParametrosSerasa"/> <element name="ResultadoSerasa" type="tns:ResultadoSerasa"/> <complexType name="ParametrosSerasa"> <sequence> <element name="num_documento" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="dt_nascimento" type="date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="dt_solicitacao" type="date" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ResultadoSerasa"> <sequence> <element name="num_documento" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="valor_restricao" type="decimal" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
